committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to designate the post office building to be constructed in West Liberty, Texas, as the "M.  P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Sr., Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the post office building to be constructed in West Liberty, Texas, as the M.P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Sr., Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the post office building to be constructed in West Liberty, Texas, as the "M.  P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Sr., Post Office Building".
